#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   int t,n,i,g,tie;
   cin>>t;

   while(t--)
   {

     cin>>n;

     int score[n];

     for(i=0;i<n;i++)
     {

       cin>>score[i];

       score[i]=score[i]*3;

     }

     g=0;

     for(i=0;i<n;i++)
     {

       cin>>tie;

       score[i]=score[i]+tie*1;

       if(score[i]>g)
       {

         g=score[i];

       }

     }

     cout<<g<<endl;

   }

   return 0;

}
